td.content: s:a female aged 26 ys indicates mild cramping, mild diarrhea, mild abdominal pain and Stomach. pt has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 70 in, Weight 208 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed sertraline - 100 mg daily, and ordered CBC.
